comments.en: Toner and drum in one unit

Cheap and compact PCL-6/XL laser printer with fully integrated horizontal paper tray.

Currently Samsung supports this printer with proprietary drivers which come with the printer on its driver CD or can be downloaded on the web sites of Samsung. Unfortunately, these drivers do not work necessarily with all Linux distributions. You will therefore probably get it more easily working by using standard PCL drivers as "pxlmono" or "hpijs".

"pxlmono" (PCL-6/XL) leads sometimes to problems, therefore we recommend "ljet4" (PCL 5e) for this printer.
